<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                    <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edfcea226f2ae0)${request.tcp.remoteAddress}"/>
                    <L7p:CounterStrategy intValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Quota stringValue="2000000"/>
                    <L7p:ReadSynchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Synchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="day"/>
                </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                    <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edfcea226f2ae0)${request.tcp.remoteAddress}"/>
                    <L7p:CounterStrategy intValue="1"/>
                    <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Quota stringValue="2000000"/>
                    <L7p:ReadSynchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Synchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="day"/>
                </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="some logic here"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                        <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edfcea226f2ae0)${request.tcp.remoteAddress}"/>
                        <L7p:CounterStrategy intValue="1"/>
                        <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Quota stringValue="2000000"/>
                        <L7p:ReadSynchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Synchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="day"/>
                    </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                </wsp:All>
                <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Yg=="/>
                        <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="a"/>
                    </L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                        <L7p:CounterName stringValue="PRESET(91edfcea226f2ae0)${request.tcp.remoteAddress}"/>
                        <L7p:CounterStrategy intValue="1"/>
                        <L7p:Global booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Quota stringValue="2000000"/>
                        <L7p:ReadSynchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Synchronous booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:TimeUnit stringValue="day"/>
                    </L7p:ThroughputQuota>
                </wsp:All>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="more"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <L7p:JavaScript>
                <L7p:ExecutionTimeout stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Name stringValue="low_code_rule_validation"/>
                <L7p:Script stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[function applyRule(crank) {
	// simulate logic execution
	var s = new Date().getTime();
	while (new Date().getTime() < s + crank);
}
// read inputs from context
var qval = context.getVariable("request.tcp.remoteIp");

// validate a rule
applyRule(32);

// add info to transaction context
context.setVariable("rule_result", "the rule has been validated");]]></L7p:Script>
            </L7p:JavaScript>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="more logic here"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="ZXhlY3V0ZWQKJHtydWxlX3Jlc3VsdH0="/>
            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="text/plain; charset=UTF-8"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
